name: Sniper Dino Hunter Simulator
description:
Have you ever dreamed about time travelling? Now this dream comes true, but your time machine played a bad joke with you and sent you to prehistory world. Humanity doesn't exist, you are alone on earth with angry hungry dinosaurs. Sniper Dino Hunter Simulator - try to survive this challenge!

Even if you are pro in deer hunting, dinosaurs hunting is uncharted territory. You have to hunt dinos unless you want to be eaten. Even cavemen have never met dinosaurs, so you are the first man who has such a chance. Good luck you!

Sniper Dino Hunter Simulator game features:
• Realistic angry dinosaurs;
• Time travel to prehistory;
• First person shooter 3D;
• Different dinosaurs.

Explore beautiful prehistory world as a dino hunter and have fun with Sniper Dino Hunter Simulator game!
